info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 11:59AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Salt Lake County through 1230 PM MDT... At 1158 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Jordan, or 8 miles south of West Valley City, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Valley City, Murray, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Midvale, Herriman, Oquirrh, Kearns, Bingham Canyon Mine, Magna and Copperton. This includes Interstate 15 near mile marker 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
